content:
TextCompositionAutoComplete Enum

Definition

Defines a set of states for the handling of automatic completion of a text composition.

In this Article

public enum TextCompositionAutoComplete
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
TextCompositionAutoComplete

Fields

Off

Auto-complete is off.
On

Auto-complete is on. A stem.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput event will be raised automatically by the TextCompositionManager after a stem.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart event is handled.
